document_data.mainbody:
Tuolasara was a dukar of the Order of Maliirn and a member of the Nantarn Council.
Hailing from Ysbhol, Tuolasara was a shalarin of the Wanderer Caste. During a trip, a rogue current sent her against the Great Barrier. She was saved by the dukar and soon Tuolasara joined them. She was sent back to Esrath as a secret dukar agent in the area collecting as much lore as possible.
After the Twelfth Ser√¥s War and the reveal of the dukar orders, Tuolasara was granted a place in the council.
